articles.title: CDC warns Americans traveling to 4 countries over outbreak of untreatable mosquito disease - Yahoo
articles.description: Global chikungunya outbreak prompts health warnings as cases surge across tropical regions. WHO reports 155 deaths from mosquito-transmitted virus.
articles.content:
U.S. health officials have issued travel advisories for Americans planning trips to certain tropical countries amid outbreaks of an untreatable mosquito-borne disease.
